question.title: is BodyInserters.fromResource (for WebCLient) an auto-closing resource
question.body:
I'm trying to send data from minio (s3) to another service. Do I need to close the resource myself after sending?

public void uploadResource(InputStream coilsMapStream) {
    Mono<Void> response = webClient.post()
            .uri(buildUri("/upload/coilsmap"))
            .body(BodyInserters.fromResource(new InputStreamResource(coilsMapStream)))
            .retrieve()
            .bodyToMono(Void.class);
}
